li.a: Teachers College Reading and Writing Project
Teachers College Reading and Writing Project

div.p: Recognizing the opportunity for improvement, taking risks to create solutions that add value or serve a need.
Acting and inspiring others to work toward a positive outcome.
Engaging in a disciplined process to deepen understanding, evaluate possibilities, or construct a reasoned judgment.
Becoming informed and acting to make an impact in small and large ways.

div.p: The Bronxville Union Free School District is monitoring COVID-19 very closely. Please see our new COVID-19 Updates page under the "District" tab for more information.
For health care workers or first responders who need child care, please reach out to the following child care centers. There will be no charge for using these providers.

p.br:
250 Mamaroneck Ave.
White Plains
914-949-8030
Director, Margarita mlozada@ymca-cnw.org

59 Vernon Place
Mount Vernon, NY
914-664-1066 or momo00142@aol.com
Monique Forsela
